features.title: Well Maintained
features.fullDescription: Our facilities undergo rigorous maintenance schedules to ensure optimal performance. Dedicated teams handle equipment maintenance, quality control systems, and environmental compliance. Preventive maintenance programs reduce downtime and ensure consistent product quality across batches.

image.alt: Maintenance team working on foundry equipment

features.title: Industrial Specialist
features.fullDescription: With over 25 years of combined experience, our team consists of metallurgists, process engineers, and industrial specialists serving automotive, aerospace, and heavy machinery sectors. We follow ISO-certified processes and deliver solutions tailored to strict industry tolerances.

features.title: Latest Equipment
features.fullDescription: We deploy computer-controlled furnaces, robotic pouring systems, 3D sand printing, and AI-powered inspection systems. This results in high-precision castings with tolerances down to ¬±0.1mm and excellent surface finish for critical components.
